context.title: Clone Git Repository
context.description: To be guided through this wizard start the cheat sheet 'Cloning a Git Repository' below.

context.title: Push To Another Repository
context.description: To be guided through this wizard start the cheat sheet 'Pushing to another Git Repository' below.

context.title: Merge Strategy 'ours'
context.description: This merge strategy uses local files and content and ignores remote files and content.

context.title: Merge Strategy 'theirs'
context.description: This merge strategy uses remote files and content and ignores local files and content.

context.title: Merge Strategy 'simple-two-way-in-core'
context.description: This merge strategy merges using two-way comparisons only (no ancestor is taken into account).

context.title: Merge Strategy 'resolve'
context.description: This merge strategy merges files and content and support only one base.

context.title: Merge Strategy 'recursive'
context.description: This merge strategy merges files and content and supports several bases.
